vault_aws_secret_backend_role.description: Creates a role on an AWS Secret Backend for Vault.

backend.description: The path the AWS secret backend is mounted at,

name.description: The name to identify this role within the backend.

credential_type.description: Specifies the type of credential to be used when

role_arns.description: Specifies the ARNs of the AWS roles this Vault role

policy_arns.description: Specifies a list of AWS managed policy ARNs. The

policy_document.description: The IAM policy document for the role. The

default_sts_ttl.description: The default TTL in seconds for STS credentials.

max_sts_ttl.description: The max allowed TTL in seconds for STS credentials
